title: Construction cost per kilometer of high-speed line in France 2014
yAxis: Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros
summary: This is a bar chart representing High-speed Line in the x axis and Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros in the y axis.
The maximum Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros 19.7 is found at High-speed Line LGV Mediterranean and the minimum is found at LGV Paris-Lyon where High-speed Line is 5.5.
The difference of Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros between the highest and lowest High-speed Line is 14.2.
min_summary: This bar chart has 8 columns on the x axis representing High-speed Line, and Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros in each High-speed Line on the y axis.
The Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros is appeared to be the highest at High-speed Line LGV Mediterranean and lowest at High-speed Line LGV Paris-Lyon.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing High-speed Line in the x axis and Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros in the y axis.
The maximum Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros 19.7 is found at High-speed Line LGV Mediterranean and the minimum is found at LGV Paris-Lyon where High-speed Line is 5.5.
The difference of Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros between the highest and lowest High-speed Line is 14.2.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing High-speed Line in the x axis and Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros in the y axis.
High-speed Line LGV Mediterranean has the highest Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros and LGV Paris-Lyon has the lowest Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros.
The second highest Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros is appeared to be the High-speed Line .
The highest High-speed Line LGV Mediterranean has 14.2 more Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros than the lowest High-speed Line LGV Paris-Lyon.
Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros at High-speed Line LGV Mediterranean is 19.7 , second place is  at 5.5, and thirdly is LGV East at 15.7.
Considered together, the average Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros in all 8 High-speed Lines is roughly 13.56.
The Construction cost per kilometer in millions of euros is 108.5 if we add up values of all High-speed Lines.
